name: 5secs
description:
5secs - it'll only take 5 seconds

This game is only a demo, with enough support I might make it a full game!

You have been transported to an unknown location through a portal with Spikes, time limits and a trusty jetpack. Escape each room within 5 seconds.
This game will put to test your platforming, time management and Jetpacking skills!

This game is currently in demo form, If enough support is given I might make a version longer than 10 levels.
